class fastai.sgdr.SaveBestModel(model, layer_opt, name='best_model')¶

Bases: fastai.sgdr.LossRecorder

Save weigths of the model with the best accuracy during training.

Args:
model: the fastai model lr: indicate to use test images; otherwise use validation images name: the name of filename of the weights without ‘.h5’
Usage:

Briefly, you have your model ‘learn’ variable and call fit. >>> learn.fit(lr, 2, cycle_len=2, cycle_mult=1, best_save_name=’mybestmodel’) …. >>> learn.load(‘mybestmodel’)

For more details see http://forums.fast.ai/t/a-code-snippet-to-save-the-best-model-during-training/12066
